data.prayer: Father, help 56 new simple churches start among the 283,100 people in the state of Orebro, Sweden. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Orebro, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 16,266 believers in Orebro to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Orebro
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 124,947 lost people in  Orebro, Sweden have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turk people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turk people.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Orebro, Sweden a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Orebro, Sweden to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Orebro, Sweden to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

location.name: Orebro
